Definition: In this task, you will be given four sentences of a story. Your job is to choose one sentence from options (A) and (B) to complete the story so that it sounds coherent.

 (A) He is happy now. (B) He joined a gang.
Positive Examples.explanation: As mentioned in fourth sentence, the incident turned a new leaf to Rick's life; so, he must be happy now.
